item.title: Newark Mayor Ras Baraka arrested for alleged trespass at New Jersey ICE detention facility
item.description: Baraka's administration had sued to block the opening of the immigrant detention facility in Newark.

item.title: Google agrees to pay Texas $1.4 billion data privacy settlement
item.description: "Google secretly tracked people's movements, private searches, and even their voiceprints and facial geometry," Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton said...

item.title: Trump administration 'looking at' suspending habeas corpus for migrants, Stephen Miller says
item.description: Multiple court cases challenging the Trump administrations effort to deport undocumented immigrants from the U.S. are based on habeas claims.

item.title: USPS board taps FedEx director David Steiner for postmaster general
item.description: Steiner, who is expected to formally take over as postmaster general at USPS in July, previously was CEO of Waste Management for more than a decade.

item.title: Trump taps CFPB director nominee Jonathan McKernan for Treasury post
item.description: McKernan previously served on the FDIC and held senior roles at the Federal Housing Finance Agency, the Senate, and the Treasury Department.
